content.question: How the court will contact you
content.communicateParagraph1: You need to agree to receive emails about the divorce to use the online service. Your email address will not be shared with your {{divorceWho}}.
content.communicateParagraph2: Your emails will be sent to:
content.communicateParagraph3: Provide a phone number to let court staff contact you more quickly. Your phone number will not be shared with your {{divorceWho}}.
content.petitionerConsent: I agree that the divorce centre can send me notifications and deliver (serve) court documents to me by email.
content.somePost: You may need to receive some correspondence by post.
content.contactDetailsNotShare: Your address will not be shared with your {{divorceWho}} as you've asked for it to be kept private. If you use adultery as your reason for divorce, this address will also not be shared with the co-respondent (if you choose to name them).
content.contactDetailsShare: Your address will be shared with your {{divorceWho}}  as you’ve not asked for it to be kept private. If you use adultery as your reason for divorce, this address will also be shared with the co-respondent (if you choose to name them).

petitionerPhoneNumber.invalid: Enter a valid telephone number. Telephone number must be a minimum length of 9 and can only contain the numbers 0-9 and the symbols +, - , ( , ) , .

petitionerConsent.required: You must agree to receive notifications and court documents by email to use this service.
